top_strengths: Multi-agent architecture with heterogeneous model routing (Opus for deep evaluators, Sonnet for structured ones)
Closed-loop audit system with chronic detection after 3 iterations is a genuine feedback loop
CLAUDE.md with 24 cross-referenced context docs demonstrates meaningful use of million-token context
top_weaknesses: Zero tests -- for a project whose value proposition is verification, having no tests is a critical contradiction
Audit pipeline has never been executed end-to-end; gap between specification and proven execution
No quick-start path exists; time to first value is too long

action_items.action: Add vitest infrastructure and write initial test suite
Run the audit pipeline end-to-end and fix whatever breaks
action_items.impact: Proves the core value proposition works

action_items.action: Add a 'Try It Now' section with zero-install evaluation
Fix prettier formatting across all source files
Add accessibility basics: skip-to-content, focus indicators, ARIA labels
